ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/ExampleE2E.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=12.2,name=iPhone X' -scheme ExampleE2E -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/ExampleE2E.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=12.2,name=iPhone X' -scheme ExampleE2E -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone X
